title: Europe's recovery outpaces expectations, but France lags behind
contentencoded: New numbers out this morning show business picking up in Europe. BBC economics correspondent Andrew Walker joins Marketplace's Mark Garrison from London to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, August 22, 2013
teaser: Things may be better in Europe than we thought.
contenttemplated:
